name: A Break in the Action
effect: The Arena heals 5 damage from each hero. Each player may take a break. If he doesn't return within 5 minutes
he loses the game.

name: A Common Enemy
effect: Ongoing: Players skip flipping Arena cards. The Arena deck is a Raid Boss hero with 1

name: A Demotion in Rank
effect: Ongoing: If any type of damage would be dealt
noob damage is dealt instead. If damage would be dealt

name: A Grave Resource
effect: Ongoing: Each player can't play cards from his hand. Each player can play cards from his graveyard

name: A Plague upon Thee!
effect: Ongoing: Each hero is in

name: A Ration of Chaos
effect: Starting with the player to your left
each player flips one Arena card.

name: A Second Chance
effect: Turn all heroes face up. If able this turn
each player may use his hero's flip power without paying its resource cost.

name: A Striking Similarity
effect: Ongoing: You pay

name: A Unique Perspective
effect: You may destroy a non-hero card for each unique card in play.

name: A Welcome Distraction
effect: Ongoing: Players skip flipping Arena cards. All heroes have Sabotage: A Welcome Distraction. When this card is sabotaged
put it into the Arena graveyard

name: All Is Forsaken
effect: Remove all allies from the game. Each player puts all ally cards from his graveyard into play.

name: Alternate Ending
effect: Ongoing: If a player would draw a card from completing a quest
he may put a card from his graveyard into his hand instead.

name: Appeal to a Higher Power
effect: Ask someone not playing in this game to choose which player he thinks is winning. Each player not chosen may draw a card.

name: Armory Inventory
effect: You may search your deck for an ability or equipment card associated with one of your online World of Warcraft

name: Aura of Fortitude
effect: Ongoing: Each ally has +X health
where X is its printed health. As Aura of Fortitude leaves play

name: Battle Preparations
effect: Ongoing: Each player can play his first card on each of his turns without paying its cost.

name: Brain Blister
effect: The Arena deals 1 slap damage to each hero for each card in that hero's controller's hand.

name: Brain Hack
effect: Each player removes the top card of the deck to his left from the game. He may place that card face up or play it without paying its cost this game

name: Broaden Your Horizons
effect: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally for each different set among cards in play you control.

name: Call to Battle
effect: Each player may put an ally card from his hand into play.

name: Can I Borrow Your Quest Log?
effect: Opponents can't complete quests this turn. You can complete opposing quests this turn.

name: Choose Wisely
effect: Each player secretly puts 1 to 6 counters into his hand
and then all players reveal their numbers. Each player with a number that no other player shares puts up to that much damage on any number of heroes and/or allies

name: Clothed in Arcana
effect: Ongoing: Each non-ongoing ability card becomes ongoing
and it is also an armor with DEF equal to its cost. When Clothed in Arcana leaves play

name: Confusion Contagion
effect: Ongoing: When an ally is dealt damage
its controller's hero may deal that much nature damage to target undamaged ally.

name: Copycast
effect: Ongoing: When a player plays a non-ongoing ability
he copies it. (That player may choose new targets for the copy.)

name: Creative Cohorts
effect: Each player may draw a card if he shares a first
middle

name: Critter Creation
effect: Ongoing: All face-down resources are also Critter allies with 1 Physical

name: Curse of Withering
effect: Ongoing: Each hero and ally has -1 health for each damage on it.

name: D.I.S.C.O.
effect: Ongoing: At the end of each player's turn
he readies all heroes and allies in his party if he can hear music.

name: Delayed Reinforcements
effect: Ongoing: If an ally card would enter play
remove it from the game instead. When Delayed Reinforcements leaves play

name: Divine Intercession
effect: Choose a race and remove all damage from heroes and allies of that race. The player to your left chooses a class and removes all damage from heroes and allies of that class.

name: Dress Code
effect: Ongoing: Unsleeved cards in play are

name: Effortless Strength
effect: Opponents can't use hero powers this turn. You can use opposing hero powers this turn.

name: Elevated Position
effect: Ongoing: Players skip their turns unless they are standing up. When a player sits down on his turn
end that turn.

name: Enchanted Linen
effect: Ongoing: If a hero would be dealt damage
prevent X of it

name: Exotic Pet
effect: You may write Pet (1) on the sleeve of an ally you own. If you do
that card also has +2 ATK / +2 health this game.

name: Fair Fight
effect: Name a face-up ability
ally

name: Finishing Move
effect: You may exchange seats with another player. That player continues your turn and the game with your cards
and you continue the game with his cards

name: First You Take My WILL Then My HAND Now This?!
effect: Ongoing: Players can't play odd costs.

name: Flickering Memory
effect: Choose an opponent
and he shuts his eyes for 10 seconds

name: For the Fallen!
effect: Ongoing: When a player strikes with a weapon
he may act it out. If he does

name: For the Light!
effect: Ongoing: When a player plays an ability
he may act it out. If he does

name: Furious Anger
effect: Ongoing: Each ally's name becomes Julius. It loses and can't have keywords
and it has +1 ATK for each keyword it loses this way.

name: Glimpse of the Nether
effect: Each player may open a sealed World of Warcraft

name: Graveyard Overpopulation
effect: Ongoing: When an ally is destroyed
its owner may put an ally card with higher cost from his graveyard into play.

name: Green Is Envy
effect: Destroy all opposing rare or epic cards.

name: I AM THE LAWGIVER!
effect: Put a 4 x 4

name: In Excess
effect: Ongoing: When an ally is dealt damage in excess of its health
put damage on its controller's hero equal to the amount of excess damage dealt.

name: Instant Gratification
effect: Ongoing: All ability
ally

name: It's Always Hallow's End Somewhere
effect: Each other player may give you a piece of candy or some other confection. The Arena deals 5 sugar damage to the hero of each player who doesn't.

name: It's Not All about You Edward!
effect: Ongoing: Players can't pay even costs

name: Join the Explorers' League!
effect: You can place any number of locations and quests this turn.

name: Just a Friendly Duel
effect: The Arena heals damage from each hero equal to the number of combined years that hero's controller has been friends with other players in this game.

name: Legendary Hero
effect: Ongoing: Heroes and allies lose their race and class and become Night Elf Mohawks. As an additional cost to propose combat
the attacking player must say

name: Level the Playing Field
effect: Each player destroys allies in his party until he controls the same number as the player with the fewest allies. Repeat this process for abilities
equipment

name: Lost Quest Log
effect: Reveal all face-down resources. Turn all revealed quests face up.

name: Mana Infusion
effect: Draw cards until you reach your maximum hand size.

name: Master of Disguise
effect: You may choose another deck you own. If you do
remove your old deck

name: Matchmaker
effect: Each player reveals cards from the top of his deck until two cards with matching names are revealed from that deck. Each player who reveals the most cards puts both of his matching cards into his hand. All other revealed cards are shuffled into their decks.

name: Mercenaries for Hire
effect: Starting with the player to your left
each player chooses an ally in the party of the player to his right. Then

name: Mind Games
effect: On the count of 3
each player says ability

name: Mindwipe
effect: All cards not in play lose and can't gain text this turn.

name: Mob Mentality
effect: The Arena deals 1 facsimile damage to each hero and ally for each hero or ally with that character's name in play.

name: Murloc Invasion
effect: Each player puts the top card of his deck into his graveyard. Then
he puts X Murloc ally tokens into play with 1

name: Nat Pagle Knows Best
effect: Reveal a card from your hand
and then each other player reveals his hand. If any other revealed cards have the same cost as your card

name: Needing Rainbow
effect: Each player may do the following for each color he's wearing: White: His hero heals 5 damage from a friendly hero or ally. Blue: Draw a card. Black: Destroy an opposing ally. Red: His hero deals 3 fire damage to an opposing hero or ally. Green: Put a location or quest card from his hand into his resource row face up and ready.

name: No Mercy
effect: Ongoing: Allies can attack only allies with lower cost.

name: Off the Beaten Path
effect: Each player may search his deck for a card from

name: Off With Their Heads!
effect: When an ally is dealt damage this turn
destroy it.

name: On Even Ground
effect: The Arena deals 5 evening damage to each Warrior hero; 4 evening damage to each Death Knight and Paladin hero; 3 evening damage to each Hunter
Shaman

name: Papa Hummel's Old-Fashioned World's Longest Card Name
effect: Destroy all opposing non-hero cards that have or share the longest name among cards in play.

name: Patience: Not Always A Virtue
effect: Each player has 10 seconds to find one World of Warcraft

name: Peace Offering
effect: Each player puts a card from his hand into the hand of the player who will celebrate his birthday soonest.

name: Peerless Effort
effect: Ongoing: Each player may exhaust his hero rather than pay the resource cost of completing a quest.

name: Play the Hand You're Dealt
effect: Ignoring heroes and resources
count how many cards in play each player controls

name: Play the Odds
effect: For each hero and ally
remove all dice being used to track its damage

name: Plead With the Heavens
effect: Each player may make a phone call. The first player to get someone to say Draw a card on speakerphone may draw a card.

name: Political Savvy
effect: Each player writes down the name of the player who complains the most. Players reveal their votes. If one player has the most votes
each other player who gives that player a tissue may draw a card.

name: Polymorph Storm
effect: Ongoing: All heroes are Sheep.(They can't attack or protect
and they lose and can't have powers.)

name: Potion of Temporary Immortality
effect: Ongoing: Other cards can't leave play.

name: Practice Makes Perfect
effect: Ongoing: At the end of each turn
turn all quests completed this turn face up.

name: Protect the Master
effect: Ongoing: Each deck is also an ally with

name: Quick Draw
effect: Ongoing: When a player plays an equipment
his hero may deal melee damage to target hero or ally equal to that equipment's cost.

name: Reversal of Fate
effect: Players can't concede this turn. If a player would lose the game this turn
he wins instead.

name: Rule of Thumb
effect: All abilities
allies

name: Seeing Double
effect: Double all

name: Shadow Sight
effect: Ongoing: All heroes and allies are Conspicuous.

name: Shadows and Fiends
effect: Ongoing: All allies have

name: Show Yourselves!
effect: Ongoing: Each Extended Art ally and weapon has +2 ATK
each EA armor has +2 DEF

name: Silence Is Golden
effect: Ongoing: Players must whisper while speaking. When a player fails to do so
the Arena deals 1 library damage to his hero for each word not whispered.

name: Spell Shaping
effect: Ongoing: Each non-ongoing ability can be played as though it were a copy of any other non-ongoing ability card with the same cost.

name: Spirit Pact
effect: Ongoing: If a card would be destroyed
put it into its owner's hand instead.

name: Steamwheedle Casino
effect: Starting with the player to your left

each player reveals cards from the top of his deck until he chooses to stop or his revealed cards have a combined cost greater than 21. A player wins if his revealed cards have or share the highest combined cost of 21 or less. Cards with no cost count as 10. Each winner puts the last card he revealed into hand. Shuffle all other revealed cards into their owners' decks.

name: That Reminds Me ...
effect: Search your deck for a card with reminder text
reveal it

name: The Bonds of War
effect: Ongoing: Players pay

name: The Divine Trinity
effect: Ongoing: When an attacker enters combat with a defender
their controllers play Rock-Paper-Scissors. The loser's character deals no damage this combat.

name: The Family That Slays Together
effect: Each player draws a card for each husband
wife

name: The Perfect Ally
effect: Ongoing: Ally cards in all zones lose their powers and have Tatulla the Reclaimer's power.

name: The Ravages of War
effect: The Arena deals 5 collateral damage to each hero in the room.

name: The Rich Get Richer
effect: Each player may reveal how much money he has in his pockets. The player with the most money searches his deck for a card and puts it into hand.

name: The Twisting Nether
effect: Turn target player's deck over.

name: There Is Nothing I Would Not Do!
effect: Ongoing: Each player must role-play his hero's voice when speaking. When the first player fails to do so
remove this card from the game

name: Tome of Knowledge
effect: You may read the flavor text of a card in your hand out loud. If you do
starting with the player to your left

name: Undercover Agent
effect: Name a card
then reveal the top five cards of a player's deck. Put all revealed cards with that name into your hand and the rest into that player's graveyard.

name: Underwater Breathing Contest
effect: Each player may hold his breath as long as possible. The player who holds his breath the longest may put a card from his graveyard into hand.

name: Unexpected Gift
effect: Put Unexpected Gift into your hand. Discard Unexpected Gift ? Destroy target ability
ally

name: Vendor-vision
effect: Each hero may deal up to 6 melee damage to target hero or ally
1 for each of the following World of Warcraft

name: Verbal Assault
effect: Your hero may deal X alphabet damage to target ally
where X is the number of words in the names of cards in play you control.

name: WANTED: Tauren
effect: The first player to hit the ceiling with a World of Warcraft

name: Wartime Efforts
effect: If you're at a convention
draw three cards. If you're in a store

name: Will of the Titans
effect: If an ongoing Arena Grand Melee card is in play
it stays in play for the rest of the game.

name: Wordsmithing
effect: Ongoing: Players may read their cards that say or as if they said and.

name: World Shaper
effect: Choose a card from the Arena graveyard and reflip it.

name: You Are Dead to Me!
effect: Ongoing: When a card is destroyed
its owner may rip it up. If he does
